attributes.action: Bring Maria Miller to real Justice
attributes.additional_details:
Just because Maria Miller is Culture Secretary in the Cabinet, this should not exclude her from the same moral and legal standards that are expected from any other citizen of the UK.
This petition is calling not only for her dismissal from government, but an end once and for all of the perceived double standards of MP's.

rejection.details: This is a party political matter and not a matter for Government
